"Techers were once an ARKS class": "Now that ARKS has more members, they've brought Techers back in an attempt to give us more defined roles."
"Techers are good at support-type techniques and light and dark techniques. A little bit different from Forces, right?"
"You'll need a recommendation. If you want to become a Techer, that is. If you show me what you've got, I might recommend you."
